title: Little Larceny
description: A stealth game about stealing a lot of things in a little amount of time.
controls:
Arrow Keys or WASD To Move
Up or W To Jump/Wall Jump
Down or S To Slide

title: Boat Bear
description:
It's A Bear In A Boat
That Does Bear In A Boat Things
Doing What Bears In A Boat Do
What More is There to Say
controls:
Tap/Click To Jump
Tap/Click The NO2 Button To Boost
